DOC.brief_summary: Observational study to collect data on maintaining anti-retroviral activity (quantitative HIV RNA determination) and immunological activity (CD4 cells) despite switching from protease inhibitor to nonnucleoside reverse transcriptase inhibitor (NNRTI) (Viramune®).
DOC.brief_title: Observational Study in Patients With HIV Infection Type 1 After Switching to a Viramune®-Containing Therapy Regimen
DOC.criteria: Adult male or female patients with HIV type 1 infection Counterindications according to summary of product characteristics (SPC) for Viramune tablets No persons under 18 Pregnancy and breastfeeding Use of oral contraceptives Use of drugs affecting CYP450 3A metabolism
